name: c64-mcp
description: Local MCP server for controlling a Commodore 64 via Ultimate 64 REST API

PORT.description: HTTP port for the MCP server

HOST.description: Bind address for the HTTP server

C64MCP_CONFIG.description: Path to configuration JSON (~/.c64mcp.json by default)

RAG_EMBEDDINGS_DIR.description: Directory containing RAG embedding JSON files

RAG_REINDEX_INTERVAL_MS.description: Periodic reindex interval in ms (0 disables)

RAG_BUILD_ON_START.description: Set to 1 to rebuild embeddings on server start

RAG_DOC_FILES.description: Comma-separated extra docs to include in RAG
